content.detailedDescription: I am a former u.S army indirect fire infantryman i have two suspected sightings to report on 2 different dates. the first sighting was on the first date. i was traveling in my car and i witnessed what looked like a firework or a flare it may of been a meteorite, it was heading on a horizontal path and i saw it for a few seconds before it went over the treeline it was headed from right to left and had a shimmering trail like a firework. the second date was july 12th 2015 on or around this date. i witnessed a star like object that was high altitude and possibly in orbit that looked like a moving star it moved for about a inch of my fingers with ( holding my hand in the sky ) and it disappeared. it was nright and looked like star.
content.summary: I am a former u.S army indirect fire infantryman i have two suspected sightings to report on 2 different dates.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out report with witness on the phone, by field investigator l. flechtner, at mufon h.Q. in newport beach, ca. on  7/23/2015
______________________________________________________________________
on july 12th, 2015, at 6:15 am, on a flight from newark, new jersey, to fort lauderdale, fl., i sat at a window seat on the 767,looking out the window. it was about an hour and 1/2 into the flight so i think we were over maryland. we were flying at 36,000 feet going south.

 i looked out the window and saw a cigar shaped, white craft. it was 1000 feet below us and 1000 feet off the starboard wing. it was below us and then rose so it was flying next to the airplane. it was dipping up and down like it was not very aerodynamic.It stayed next to us for a few seconds, and just leisurely flew away. it happened so fast i didn't get a chance to take a picture. of course no one else said anything. 
it acted like it was checking us out.
content.summary: On a flight from newark, new jersey to fort lauderdale, fl. i looked out the window and saw a cigar shaped, white, craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was celebrating the 4th of july with friends at the corner of 54th ave ne & 61st st ne in marysville, wa. one friend and i saw two separate red pulsating objects in the sky, off to the east, we confirmed with each other we were not seeing fireworks or flare guns, we sat outside, watched these lights travel the sky east to west, ascend and descend, the two lights would be far apart in the sky, one off to the west and one to the east and then within seconds they were right back next to each other in the sky. it could best be described as playing a game or tag, there was obvious communication between the two objects due to their travel patterns. my friend and i walked to the gas station, talked about what we were seeing, firmly both agree they were in fact ufo's, i personally do not know of technology that would allow the travel patterns we witnessed, they could not have been fireworks, we were watching fireworks across the sky all night and comparing the fireworks to the crafts side by side in the sky. it appeared that time was manipulated, it appeared as though the crafts were able to travel from one side of us far in the sky to another side, appeared to be a very long distance in a very short amount of time. the size of the crafts appeared equal, both maybe a penny or between penny and quarter held up to the sky. they appeared closer or bigger than stars in the sky and would only stop moving for seconds, constant movement. i first noticed the objects because i was outside at a 4th of july party and staring into the sky watching fireworks but off to the left in my vision i kept seeing these red lights that were not acting the same as fireworks. i asked a friend present at the party if he would take a minute to see what i was seeing, we talked and observed the objects for what felt like hours. i would say the time frame was between 10 pm and 4 am. it was well after sunset pitch black sky but before the sunrise on the horizon. pacific timezone. i felt overwhelmed at first, among 10 or so people present only myself and 1 other will go on record saying what we say was 2 ufo's, the others present were too occupied with drinking, eating, conversing, playing outdoor games, overall celebrating the 4th of july. all i had to do was take 10 minutes, take a deep breathe and really absorb the information my brain was perceiving. there were no explanations for what i saw and every time i tell this story and someone discounts me saying, maybe it was fireworks, maybe it was a plane, maybe it was a flare, maybe, maybe maybe... they did not see what i saw and there is no way to convince people to perceive the information in the same way i did, without personal experiences some people will not be able or willing to understand what i am telling them/you. my fear disappeared after a few moments of reminding myself that only i am in control of my actions and if i am afraid communication will likely not happen. i have had very mind altering/ spiritual experiences since living in washington state from 2012 until present. this among other experiences have transformed the way i view the world, the universe and consciousness as a whole. i am learning to face my fears and joining this site/ sharing my story is helping me do that. i believe there is no reason to be afraid of something that has demonstrated no harm, irrational fears are all inventions of your mind. taking back control of my mind and freeing myself has allowed me to channel higher intellectual entities and i am on a path to share those experiences with the world. we are in need of unity, not division. we need to overcome or re-program the binary thought process most of our society uses to make decisions. this is not a matter of whether "aliens" or ufos exist... this is a much much larger picture than that, take 1,000 steps back and ask not only why are they here, but what can we learn, what do we need to learn, what are we/ have we been doing wrong, what has offset the universe, how do we restore balance, how do we create unity, community consciousness to global consciousness to universal consciousness. it all starts with you.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 unidentified flying objects during the 4th of july 2013

content.detailedDescription: Was checking our cameras and we seen these gray things in the sky and they was gone
content.summary: 20 feet

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out report with witness on the phone, by field investigator 
l.Flechtner, at mufon h.Q., in newport beach, ca., on 7/23/2015
_________________________________________________________________________

about two years ago, in the summer, july or august, during a full moon,i looked up and saw a fleet of golden rectangles crossing the sky then i saw another fleet and then another fleet. they were very high in the sky and the light reflected off of them. they appeared golden and had a rectangle shape. they were in a rectangle formation as they flew together across the sky.They flew from the south to the north towards canada. there was no sound and no airplanes in the area.  this happened again the next night also. 

in the fall of 2014 i saw a large mother ship hovering over boulder, co.
i was near the hospital  when i looked up and saw the belly of the craft. it had white running lights evenly spaced around the ship. somebody must have seen this. i didn't see it leave.
content.summary: About two years ago, in the summer, i looked up and saw a fleet of golden rectangles crossing the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was at the track agian around 8:30 i heard a jet flying around it sounded like it was right above me do i started looking for it till i saw it flying south east  towards these star shape objects in the distance i started  flashing my flash light in that direction as much as i could till i could not see them any more from the track .So by then i walked around to find my girlfriend so we can go so i started walking home when we got on the side walk right by sunnyside high school i started with my flash light agian positing it in south sw so as i was doing that i notice a star that started blinking at first it was so high in the air i thought it was a plane but wheni flashed my light at it it flashed its light blinking it in the same order i was doing it . i did it 3 time then it did it 3 times so i started doing the light in differnt settings in excitement i told my girlfriend that was walking with me to look up and watch this so she saw the light  blinking and traveling at the same time it was a lil bit cloudy last night but clear enough to see the objects shape it looked like a star but an out line of a plate i could see the the shade of  camouflage it ws using to cover it self in darkness id say like the movie predator used with the alien all you cold see was the star light blinking away and it was going way faster and smoother then a jet no noise and slike as could be with all them air craft around and the base right there on valencia . 3 days in a row i have witness ufos in my back yard now the question is .Is it a hot spot or could it be the middle program in our back yard either way i believe in what. seen . also there wear 3 vans parked with 1 women in the back a man in the middle van and another women parked right in front of him the both of the women did not give me eye contact but the man did he was white with blue eyes and was wearing a black shirt that said fax on it he looked right at me and lefted his head up to me like saying what are you looking at . it felt out of place because the two lady's wear just staring at the sky and there wasn't any school and it was night time and they wear parked at the bus pull in not a spot just to park and be there not doing anything . we'll after a few time with the light i did  go home and just stay inside .
content.summary: Went for a walk heard a jet in the distance the saw the 3 star ships in the distance by the mountians .

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone, by field investigator l. flechtner, at mufon h.Q.  witness did not want to use his last name  and has no internet available. 7/23/2015
_________________________________________________________________________

on july 18th, at 12:45 am, i was outside trying to see the space station, when i saw a huge object in the sky above me. it had no sound, no lights, and was moving very slowly from the east to the west. i could omly see it because i could make out reflected light from the ground on the belly of the craft. it was round and dark gray, matte colored, and a little fuzzy like a mirage. it didn't seem to be in a hurry and i watched it move slowly away behind some trees. i guess it was about 10000 feet high and the size of a 747. i live near three airports and see 747s all the time. right before i saw the craft, i heard a private jet take off and i looked in that direction and saw the craft. nobody seemed to be chasing it.
seatac is two miles south of me.
content.summary: I went outside to see the space station and saw this huge round object silently and slowly going overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the driveway with my boyfriend loading trash into his truck bed. i'm not sure why i noticed the object. i have poor vision without my glasses, however my boyfriend has better than 20/20 vision uncorrected. i asked him what the object in the sky was. he said it looked like an airplane without wings. the object seemed very high up as we tried to observe if it was an airplane. as we studied the object it seemed to glide downward in a random way as if carried by the wind like a bird. as we watched the object we actually began to consider if it was a bird, as the object now seemed to move in this random way and appeared to be white in color. then it seemed impossible it was a bird because it was so high in the sky. we had also considered it was a drone but it was too high in the sky. also the object now seemed too large to have ever even considered it a bird. it appeared muted gray with white lights on the back side which was now all we could see as it left in a direct or deliberate pattern as opposed to the random overhead gliding. the entire event last approximately 5-7 minutes.  there was a sense of incredulity and interest. however there was this sense of disbelief as though our eyes were playing tricks on us, and we just couldn't figure out what it was no matter how we tried. sounds ridiculous but it almost felt as though the overhead gliding was intentional and meant to confuse us greatly. after the random gliding directly overhead, it then moved in a straight line from se to w.  we watched the object until we could no longer see it as it approached the gulf of mexico.
content.summary: One witness and i observed an object in the air which seemed to be at a great distance but also gliding downwards as we studied it. it then seemed very different and further as it moved away on a straight path. it was a white then dull gray tube.

content.detailedDescription:
Group sighting: "there's sputnik"

it was a saturday night around the bbq / fire pit at the lake (clearwater).  it was one of the weekends that the cousins joined us.  around the fire was me, mom, dad, uncle x, aunt x and some cousins.

it was now after dark and the sky was full of stars. while everyone is hanging out around the fire, dad comments that it's about time for sputnik to come through the sky. 

shortly later, dad proclaims "there's sputnik" and sure enough, a satellite was heading south to north and was nearing noon high directly above. only a moment into watching, dad says here comes another one and another one and another one.

three objects that looked equally bright and equal in size to the satellite came zooming and made a triangular formation around the satellite and synchronized their pace with it.  each object came from different directions at un-comprehendable speeds given satellites travel in the range of 17,000 miles per hour in orbit.  one came from what seemed like due south, the next was from the west and the last was from the east.  they showed up one at a time, but immediately after each other.

after watching the 3 objects track the satellite for only seconds, all three objects zoomed off back in the directions they came.  unlike their arrival, the departure was exactly simultaneous and possibly moved even faster than when they arrived.  there was no sign of ramping up to speed, their acceleration seemed instantaneous.
content.summary: While watching a satellite pass 3 objects came from south east & west then followed the satellite then zoomed back off

content.detailedDescription: Early in the morning i went outside to have a smoke,,i live in a wooded area with partial clearing,,, i was facing due east and was looking out into the woods when out of the corner if my eye,, se about 2 o'clock direction maybe 20 feet above the ground and approximately 30 away from me in an area of woods i had cleared,, it was not higher than the trees and was in front of the trees in the clearing,,,i looked and saw a sterling silver/chrome orb with a purple center light hovering/but not moving ,, looking directly at me,, when i made eye contact with it,, the center purple light got brighter as if it had just taken a picture of me,, 1 second later after the light dimmed the orb disappeared from my sight in front of me,,, i went out in the clearing to check out the terrain and noticed nothing out of the ordinary,, remember i live in a wooden area ,, with lots of trees,, but this was in a clearing i had made and i knew what the area looks like and there was nothing different or out of place,,,
content.summary: Sterling silver orb with purple center light takes picture

content.detailedDescription: I observed a single glowing orange to red and orange to gold/white, very bright light in the western sky just before and after sunset. i live about an hour from indianapolis airport and see planes frequently but they have small blinking lights and are generally accompanied by a variety of noises. this light did not have blinking lights nor did it follow the usual paths associated with airport traffic. i have watched it three times in one week (july). i would step away to ask someone else to look and it would be gone by time i got back. it's too low to be a star and it is not high enough for commercial flights. everyone disbelieves me and i tried to observe for the duration but something always happens and i miss it leaving. i do not feel uncomfortable or uneasy but it is probably farther away than it appears because it is near the horizon. maybe 30-45 degrees. i'm not saying it's aliens, or the government,or anything,just that it is unusual and not the normal evening scenery.
content.summary: Orange light hovered in the west for at least 30 minutes 3 times this week

content.detailedDescription: Was taking pics of a incoming storm, sent the pics to a friend online to show storm. she circled the two objects sent the pics back asking did i notice these?
content.summary: 2 sphere craft caught in pics of storm

content.detailedDescription:
I was a young copilot for aviacsa airlines on a fokker 100 based in merida yucatan in 1993 in mexico.
we departed monterrey mexico for juarez mexico in the morning,,,less than one hour into the flight we saw six very  bright lights hovering over the mountains about 30 miles to the west. at first we thought they  were chicken farms. then we saw them climb above the mountain ridge were they hovered. we kept observing them while climbing our aircraft to 28000 feet. they kept getting closer and climbing with us, eventually they stopped looking like bright lights, because as they got closer to us they became very clear flying discs.
all white with no contrails or wing forms.
they were six and they sort of hovered and flew alongside, maybe 5 to ten miles to our left. the captain and i discussed what they might be and the flight attendants came in to look at them as well.
they didn't fly in straight formation like jet fighters do,, they climbed with us and floated next to us for about five to ten minutes.
then i got on the radio with air traffic control from monterrey, i asked them if they had military traffic in the area... and they said no,, and asked what i had seen.
i said i saw six bright round objects, and inmmediately  silence on the radio came. then, in a split second, they dissappeared. 
they  vanished without leaving any trails or contrails.
we kept looking for them and soon saw them again over the same mountain ridge, hovering as bright lights, all six of them.
that week, i flew that same flight twice, and on both ocassions we saw them again as bright lights hovering over the same mountain ridge.
except this time they did not approach us...
this area were they were first seen is called the area of silence and is off limits by the mexican military. rumor is that there is a certain mineral that changes the gravitational properties of the speed of sound, therefore , sound travels much slower. it is believed that they use that mineral for propulsion.
this experience convinced me of extraterrestial life and i know now,, that they been around for thousands of years, according to ancient manuscripts.
captain henry enrique horta
content.summary: I w bright as an airline pilot, six objects seen as lights approached while climbing, then they were white discs in formation for about five minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were outside (in the country) talking. i was looking across the southern sky. at one point i looked at him and then swept the southern sky with my eyes, left to right. suddenly three very bright lights caught my attention to the left. i say to my husband, “oh wow! how the heck did i miss that?” he also hadn’t noticed them a moment ago.

there were three(aspirin sized) lights that were the same color as the surrounding stars but much brighter. they were in a triangular formation with the base on top and point on the bottom. they seemed to just appear. they slowly started moving to the left. and as they moved, all in sync about half an inch apart, the top two lights started to fade. the top left light vanished first, then the top right light and eventually so did the lower light. 

they didn’t move a great distance across the sky before disappearing, maybe two, three inches. this all took place in about 10-15 seconds. they looked to be really far away.

also, in the 10 minutes we stood outside. i saw 3 other moving objects. they were a lot dimmer. these kind of lights we see all the time and just assume they must be satellites.
content.summary: Three lights forming a triangle

content.detailedDescription: Looking toward crescent moon sw from our patio.  noticed two bright orange horizontal lights...Left light went dark, then the right light.  approx. 30 seconds later, both lights returned at same location and elevation.  both went dark again after about 10 seconds.  no additional sightings.
content.summary: Two twin bright orange lights, closely syncronized, but separation of lights to great to be a single aircraft.   may be two helicopters?

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside the kitchen of the cookeville rescue mission. at the time i was in charge of the kitchen; at approx. 7pm, looking up toward the west i noticed three star like objects in the sky. i say star like because they were too low in the sky to be stars. i saw them again later that week but there were 7. i got out of my position walked toward the street in order to the west and saw 5 more. i tried taking a picture with my cell phone but was unable to see them on the cell phone screen, which i found extremely odd.I then went to bed. i was not alarmed or frightened as i know that extraterrestrials exist and have for far longer than recorded history reveals.
content.summary: Looked just like stars

content.detailedDescription: Story is short. short vacation to niagara falls ny. i stayed above taking pics of the falls and the river. i felt i was being watched. no one was with me. my bf walked down to the falls edge and i took pics. i did not notice this in the pics immediately. when we got home to ohio i uploaded to my desktop and noticed it then. i didn't hear anything at the time , just felt a strong sense of being watched
content.summary: Niagara falls ny side nov  cold. taking pics of area was sight seeing. several pics of same area. none have this in any of them. not there. then there then gone

content.detailedDescription:
On 2015-07-20 at approximately 09:05 hrs my family and i were at glengarry park in ne edmonton, ab.  my children were playing on the kids equipment and i was speaking with my wife while keeping a watchful eye on them.  the weather was mainly sunny/clear with a few clouds and approximately 20 degrees celsius.  

i happened to look up in the sky, which was very bright from the sun.  something caught my eye and i focused in on what i can only describe as an object which appeared very high in the sky.  i watched as the object appeared to be still, bright white, and not moving.  i could not make out a shape but it appeared very bright and circular.  i quickly pointed and told my wife to look up, which she did.  she was able to focus in on the object quite quickly.  a moment later, we both noticed the object was not alone.  at first we both observed 2 more objects which between the 3, formed a triangle.  then i observed a fourth object to the left of the triangle, and then another to the right.  the objects began moving to the ne at varying speeds.  at this time, i noticed one of the objects appeared to go from a bright white to a bluish color, and another from white to a hint of orange.  

throughout the event, most of the objects appeared to go in and out of focus.  at times we had to look away and then back in order to find them again.  one object though (the first one i saw) was always easy to spot.  in fact, this was the only object that decreased altitude and came significantly lower than the others (this happened about 5 minutes after first spotted).  

my wife and i estimated approximately 7-9 objects were seen during the event which lasted approximately 25 minutes.  during the event my wife and i attempted multiple short video recordings on our iphone devices.  at the time, we did not think the camera was picking up the objects as we could not see them on the screen.  the glare from the sun and reflection on the screen made it impossible to see anything.  we did our best guesses in pointing though and upon review found some clear footage of one of the objects and a faint view of at least two more.  she was also able to zoom in on the clearest object but found it would not focus.  

at one point during the event, while observing the object and preparing my camera to take another recording, i noticed a passenger jet travelling in the direction of the clearest object.  i was able to get a recording of the object and jet in close proximity to each other.  it appeared the plane was lower in altitude but it's difficult to say for sure.  in review of the footage, i also noticed the clearest object's shape is hard to make out but it does appear to have one when zoomed in.  

both my wife and i have never seen anything like this before.  the objects would change directions in an instant and appeared to go from very fast (faster than the jet) to not moving at all.  we also noticed the objects were making various triangle formations as the moved.  as well, at no time did we observe a jet stream or anything emitting from the objects.  the park where the event occurred is approximately 10 km sw of canadian forces base edmonton on the north end of the city.

our backgrounds, i am a retired police officer and my wife is a teacher.  

we are very interested in having this video analyzed to find out what we saw on this day.
content.summary: Ufo's observed by family at park - edmonton, ab

content.detailedDescription: Met with my neighbors to look at the land our future home is being built on. looked like a weird oil spill around the sun (greenish, blue) so i took a picture. looked at the picture when i came home and saw the "orb" thought it was my camera being dumb until i zoomed in and saw that the object was under a cloud in one picture then moved itself out of the cloud. knew then that it wasnt a spot on my camera lense. am not sure what it is..... any idea?
content.summary: Large, illuminated orb with structural pattern

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading home from work in dekalb on peace rd. when i noticed two objects in the north to north east sky. their distance appeared to be at some point north of sycamore; perhaps within a mile of the more northern crossing of peace and rt. 23. and more in line with airport rd.
i watched them to see if movement was apparent. the sky was relatively clear and not much for markers to judge with. when they didn't seem to be moving, i considered they might be helicopters checking high tension lines, but there are none in that area and they were too high to be doing that. i couldn't identify any structure indicating a tail or wings either man made or natural. at the distance i was at (approx. 3-4 miles away) they looked to be little more than circles or balls. they didn't reflect the sunlight  and there was no flickering to indicate movement or lights.
other possibilities that i dismissed were kites (being so early i highly doubt it), paragliders (again unlikely due to time of day and also lack of movement), and hawks (no movement as if they were riding the thermals)
the first object was perhaps 1000 ft up at most. the second was about equidistant between the first and the ground and was more east from the first at an angle of 30-45 degrees.
i watched as long as i could and even took a more rural road over to airport rd. to maintain eye contact, but the trees eventually obscured them as i got closer. by the time i reached rt. 64, and have a relatively unobstructed view, they were gone. i even went out of town and searched the skies with nothing but open fields and still found nothing.

i'm not willing to call these ufos but definitely an unknown. i hope someone else will have seen these as well and be able to collaborate this event.
content.summary: Distant unmoving object

content.detailedDescription: I was simply out taking photos of the sunset in miyajima island just south of hiroshima took about 20  photos, as i was going thru the shots later came across one that appears  to show a child in the cloud formation, its directly in the top in the middle. i am pretty sure its just a result of the cloud formation that day but wanted experts to take a look.... thank you
content.summary: What appears to be child in the cloud

content.detailedDescription:
I am hoping your department may be able to help with something i managed to photograph last night in switzerland (21st july 2015 at around 11pm)

last night sitting in my lounge i noticed a strange orange light, i thought it was at first a plane as we can often see the flight path heading to geneva from our balcony.
i saw a single point of light similar to the headlight on a commercial aeroplane, it was orange.  next to it, i saw an orange streak, it was actually the streak which appeared quite quickly that caught my eye.  the point of light was about the size i would expect for a commercial plane, but the streak next to it i found odd.  it was higher up in the sky, around where i would expect a flight path to be for a commercial plane.

after probably 30 seconds, the orange streak went away and the single point of light persisted probably another minute and then also faded out. i thought perhaps it was one of those chinese lanterns burning up.  i was also wondering if i had just witnessed a plane on fire.

several minutes later, sitting back on the couch, i notice the light again this time larger and more of a streak than a point of light.
i called my wife to have a look, we both remarked it was strange and she commented it may be a chinese lantern also.
i went to get my camera at this point and snapped one photo before it faded out - probably only 30seconds to 1 minute from sighting to fading away had passed.

a few minutes later again, and the glow was back and much, much larger.  it was also much lower in the sky, appearing over the small hills we can see from our balcony out towards jura, and le vallee du joux.  it was quite large, and stayed for several minutes.  after a few minutes it also simply faded away to nothing.

i managed to take some photos of this anomoly, one photo when it was a streak as described the 2nd time, lastly when it was quite low and persisted for some time we took quite a few photos.

the problem i have is that i was using a low light setting with no tripod, and you can see the house lights on the hill are streaked from the long exposure time as i have moved slightly.
some photos are much better than others, 2 photos in particular are reasonably clear, and i was hoping you may be able to comment on what this anomoly may be?
i am completely baffled as to what the thing is, i thought this may interest you.

i am using a canon eos 650d with a 55 to 250mm lense.  it was taken in the direction of vallee du joux / jura from lausanne.  to give you an idea of scale, you can clearly see the lights from the houses on the hill below (which are some what smeared from the long exposure in the photos)

due to file size i have sent you only the 4 photos which i believe are the best quality with the least smearing.  i do have more photos if they would help you in a determination, i am happy to provide them to you.  the last photo is a photo of the hill taken from roughly the same position, with the exact same photo and lense settings to give you an idea of scale and position - perhaps it is possible to overlay the daytime photo with the night photo to get a good idea of spatial positioning.

you can see that it is definately not a plane.  in this final phase when i was able to take several photos, the size of it was just much too large, too strange to be a plane, and much much too low to ground.

in one of the photos, if you zoom you can see some textures on the object, but it is quite hard to tell if that is because of the movement of the photo.

if you have any idea what this anomoly might be, please offer any explanation you may have.

all rights reserved.
although i agree to submitting these photos for analysis and discussion, i grant only limited license on the proviso that you recieve 20% commission for images sold, i remain the owner/author and expect 80% of all monies (if any) you make on provided images to be paid to me.  i am not supplying you my images for you to profit with no reward for myself.  hate to add that to the bottom of this report, but after reading your disclaimer at the bottom your terms are unclear.  i do not grant exclusive rights to mufon. in the interest of scientific research and disclosure and intellectual property, i reserve all rights to these images.  therefore i agree to your terms at the bottom of the page, with the change to terms as stipulated above.
content.summary: Orange flame like glow, only discernable as solid in photos

content.detailedDescription: My 5 year old son and i were star watching/ ufo watching. the only reason i say ufo watching is because this is the 29th ufo i've seen. this is my first report. last night i saw two of these glowing orbs ad tonight i saw three. i've seen around 18 of these orb type ufos but tonight was different. (btw i log my sightings in a very detailed manner.) tonight at around 10:06 pm the second orb started in the north, headed south, small glowing object that appeared far away. it did what they usually do which was move slowly and steadily and usually they disappear in mid-air, but this one became incredibly bright for several seconds! my son and i were quite startled and the light was so bright it blinded me for a second and i couldn't see, so i didn't see it disappear but it must have because it was gone. i felt very strange afterward, usually when i see something unusual it doesn't affect me this much; i felt like i had butterflies in my stomach and i felt overwhelmed with adrenaline. my son seemed very excited too. i have chronic pain in my hip and this may be a coincidence, but my hip stopped hurting. it's been 2 hours and it still doesn't hurt.
content.summary: outside star watching/ ufo watching. craft was north, small starlike and moved south, when at farthest point south craft made hugely bright light, made me feel nervous.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my house,going for a walk,when i noticed these strange clouds near the ground
content.summary: Unknown shape clouds over buildings

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling north on military drive, taking pictures of the base. saw a group of bombers and thought it would make some great pictures to take home. when looking at the pictures, i noticed a glowing orb above the boeing hanger where they test engines near the south entrance to lackland airbase, san antonio
content.summary: Glowing orb that appeared on photo. did not see at first until photo was looked at.

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting outside where i live enjoying the sunset, evening air, and the moon.  it was getting dark, about 25 minutes after sundown (my video timestamp can verify this).  i was especially enjoying the moon getting brighter through the trees since it was really starting to get darker.  through the trees i noticed at first one object. at first, i just thought it was an aircraft.  then i noticed it had an interesting color to it.  i would call it orangish-red.  it seemed to be fairly close.  then i saw two other objects similar to it behind it.  they didn't seem to be in any particular formation.
     realizing that these objects weren't anything ordinary to me, and i think i've seen a fair number of conventional aircraft as well as tracked the  international space station on occasion, i decided i should take a video. i had my cell phone with me and with some fiddling around to get the video going, i recorded footage of about 2 minutes.  part of that footage is me walking over away from the trees to get a clearer view.  although i could see one object for many more seconds the video only seemed able to show one craft for a few seconds before being lost in the lower light conditions and the fact that the object was now much smaller heading northwest.  in retrospect, it seems the objects may have been traveling faster than i first would have thought.  
     a radio controlled clock we have in the kitchen showed 9:12pm after i had been inside a few minutes.  the video clip file shows 9:08pm.  i recorded the video clip with a samsung galaxy note 3 in the hd mode.
content.summary: About 25 minutes after sunset,first objects appeared orangish-red then later in the distance silvery

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting mt baker with my friend and i took a picture from the parking lot on the mountain of mt. shuksan. the first picture that i took had no people in it and no object.  then another tourist asked if i would like them to take a picture of us.  i handed her my camera - the picture was taken with 2 minutes of the first one and in that picture there is something over mt. shuksan.  i couldn't figure out what it could be.  it was just strange.  we did not see it...Just have it in our photograph.

picture one is of mt. shuksan with nothing and picture 2 has my friend and i and the "object"

if you were ever to do anything with this photograph...I would ask that you blur out the lady with the striped top on the left hand side.  she has since passed away and i wouldn't want to upset any family.  i am on the right in the light pink zippered shirt.

i hope that you can tell me what this is or isn't.  for a long time, i have tried to figure it out.  

thanks for your time.
content.summary: Image in picture over mt. shuksan

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting in my laid back chair in my back yard looking at the sky as i do most evenings with coffee.  often looking for the iss or lacroose 5 satellites for entertainment.  looking to the nw watching shooting stars
as i am aware that there is a fair amount of them during this time of year.  i noticed an object in the north sky. the very small orange dot moved from right to left and then made a c shape turn and then moved back to the right only to make another backwards c shape turn that turned into a question mark shape.  it then moved outward for a second then disappeared. the object moved unlike anything that i have ever seen before.  i was yelling to my girlfriend  " look at that " in the time frame of saying it four times the event was over.  i knew that i had seen nothing like i had ever seen before and was very excited.
content.summary: Orange dot as high as the stars.  the same size of a star in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: This happened when i was in 8th or 9th grade about 25 years ago.  i can still remember it clearly.  i was walking to my bus stop at the intersection of clearview and lee roads in allison park.  i got there early before anyone else and put my book bag down.  it was a clear sunny day with no clouds.  i turned around (facing lee rd.) and instantly noticed a glowing orange red "ball" in the sky just sitting there.  it was about the size of your pinky nail at arms length.  i want to emphasis that this object was clearly observable... not some small far away vague red dot in the night sky.  i wish we had cellphone cameras back then because this was very clear and relatively large in broad daylight. anyway, i just stood there and watched it sitting in the sky trying to figure out what the heck it was.  because of how clear it was i can defiantly say it was not a plane, helicopter, chinese lantern, balloon, planet, etc...  it did not move for over a minute and seemed solid yet glowing, as opposed to painted.  after a minute or so it started moving slowly but suddenly left (not like the wind was moving it) and as it moved it seemed to "flatten" out so it was no longer perfectly round but was more oval in shape yet still symmetrical.  there were tall trees to the left so i started walking up clearview rd. toward harts run rd. so i could keep it in my line of sight.  it continued its slow but steady movement and after getting about 1/8th of a mile up the road i decided to run back and see if i could catch it on the other side of the trees.  that was the last i saw of it.  the closest thing to an "explanation" i can think of was that it was a balloon... but it wasn't.  i could see it clearly and balloons are not perfectly round, do not hover for a minute then suddenly move in a controlled and purposeful manner, change shape like that, balloons don't glow!  this was something i cannot to this day explain and i still think about it from time to time... 25 years later.
content.summary: Orange red orb witnessed in broad daylight medium range changed shape

content.detailedDescription:
on 042101jul2015 my wife, son and i were watching neighborhood fireworks. my wife suddenly pointed out an orange globe moving very slowly across the night sky, but with no sound. it had no blinking lights. there was a very slight white-blue hue at the front (direction of travel) of the globe, but it was mainly glowing red-orange. encircling the bottom of the globe, i noticed an absence of light, like a black bubble of energy.
    the orb moved slowly southwest for approximately 10-15 seconds, then steadily and rapidly accelerated in the same direction for another 10-15 seconds. halfway through the sighting, i called the attention of two asian couples a few houses to the east so that they could witness the orb, too. just before the orb was out of sight, it zig-zagged rapidly three to four times then straightened and disappeared. there was no sound or smoke associated with the orb. also, no other commercial aircraft were visible for several minutes prior to or following the sighting. 
    *curiously, the event occured at the same time the fireworks were scheduled to commenced at the las vegas strip and red rock casino. i am a 35yr old retired veteran from 1/75 ranger regiment, and to me this specific timing suggests an intellegent attempt to cloud the validity of and create ambiguity surrounding this sighting. it may also have historical implications as it was on 04jul and ivo a us af base.
content.summary: A silent orange globe traveled very slowly then rapidly accelerated ssw. it "waved" back and forth just before out of sight.
